name: Do-Hyeong Lee
details: Do-Hyeong Lee received a B.S. degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include analog and digital circuit designs of clock and data recovery (CDR).

name: Suk-Min Yoon
details: Suk-Min Yoon received a B.S. degree in electrical engineering from Yeungnam University, Gyeongsan, South Korea. His research interests include analog and digital circuit designs of Processing In Memory(PIM).

name: Han-Gil Yoo
details: Han-Gil Yoo is pursuing a Bachelor's degree in the school of electrical engineering at Hanyang University, Ansan, South Korea. His research interests include analog and digital circuit designs of processing in memory (PiM).

name: Ju-Yong Lee
details: Ju-Yong Lee received a B.S. degree in electrical engineering from Gachon University, Sungnam, South Korea. His research interests include Wireline Interface.
